revision.text:
[[File:LeafStone.jpg|thumb|200px|The Leaf Stone]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Leaf Stone costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]] It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Saffron City]] in [[Kanto]] and [[Shops#Hoenn:_Locations_and_items|Fortree City]] in [[Hoenn]]. It can also be mined from the [[Underground]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Gloom.png|40px]] Gloom || [[File:Vileplume.png|40px]] Vileplume |- | [[File:Weepinbell.png|40px]] Weepinbell || [[File:Victreebel.png|40px]] Victreebel |- | [[File:Exeggcute.png|40px]] Exeggcute || [[File:Exeggutor.png|40px]] Exeggutor |- | [[File:Nuzleaf.png|40px]] Nuzleaf || [[File:Shiftry.png|40px]] Shiftry |- | [[File:Pansage.png|40px]] Pansage || [[File:Simisage.png|40px]] Simisage |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
